name: esm-potrace-wasm
description: A modern ESM build of the Potrace library for use in the browser.

scripts.build:win32: npm run clean && mkdir dist && @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./build.ps1 && npm run terser
scripts.build:default: npm run clean && shx mkdir ./dist && bash ./build.sh && npm run terser
scripts.terser: shx echo "export { potrace, ready as init };" >> ./dist/temp.js && npx terser --compress --mangle --comments /@license/ --ecma 8 --module --output ./dist/index.js -- ./dist/temp.js && shx rm ./dist/temp.js && shx cp ./src/index.d.ts ./dist/index.d.ts
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run fix && npm run build

author: Thomas Steiner (tomac@google.com)
